counsellor.name: Mrs. Lisa
counsellor.descrip: Mrs. Lisa is our counsellor in this challenging time, and A counsellor is what we all need, especially for kids and youth. Ms Lisa has experience of 10 years of with various organizations.

trainers.name: Mr. Henry
trainers.descrip: Mr. Henry is our leading trainer he has experience providing training to kids especially in adventurous sports such as wall climbing.

trainers.name: Mr. Jack
trainers.descrip: Mr. Jack has trained many people at various government-run organizations in survival skills. He has a lot of experience in adventurous activities, including boot camp.

trainers.name: Mr. John
trainers.descrip: Mr. John has an outstanding physique and vast experience in water sports. He is specialized in training youths in water sports such as kayaking and physical health.

trainers.name: Mr. Shroud
trainers.descrip: Mr. Shroud is an expert in video gaming. He has played in many tournaments. He used to train gamers in a private organization before joining us.

psychiatrist.name: Dr. Olivia
psychiatrist.descrip: Dr. Olivia is always present on-site. She had an outstanding career before she joined us to provide mental health sessions and guidance on living a positive life.

dietitian.name: Dr. Amelia
dietitian.descrip: Diet is an essential part of our life. We have doctor Emilia as our dietitian who provides a healthy diet to the children, takes a weekly analysis, and suggests accordingly.
